170a5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i phyir te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang khams gsum pa la gnas pa de ni yongs su zad par 'gyur gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang khams gsum pa la mi gnas par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de ni byang
170a6(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po'i mthar ma thug gi bar du bar ma dor gang yang zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
170a7(mdo sde): kyi yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi zad pa'o/ / // bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi zad pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
170a8(mdo sde): 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'o/ /de dag gi rtsa ba'i rten dang gnas ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / tshad med pa bzhi po dag ste/ de tshad med pa bzhi
170b1(mdo sde): po 'di la bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas sems las su rung ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de sems las su rung ba thob pas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag go/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum
170b2(mdo sde): pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ des bsam gtan thob pas lus dang sems yang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lus dang sems yang ba dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa la 'jug pa mngon par
170b3(mdo sde): sgrub bo/ /de mngon par shes pa la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pa dang ldan pas 'dun pa las sam/ brtson 'grus las sam/ sems las sam/ dpyod pa las rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa skyed do/ /de la 'dun pa ni/
170b4(mdo sde): gang chos de dag la mngon du phyogs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus ni gang chos deg sgrub pa'o/ /sems ni gang chos de dag la rtog pa'o/ /dpyod pa ni gang chos de dag la mkhas pa ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon par
170b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa rnams kyis yang dag par sgrub ste/ de'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dun pas ni rnam par sgrub bo/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni rdzogs par byed do/ /sems kyis ni rnam par 'jog
170b6(mdo sde): go/ /dpyod pas ni rnam par 'byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni mos pa las byung ba mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/ rang gi sems skyed pas dbang byed pa/ ji ltar 'dod
170b7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du 'gro ba yongs su spang ba legs par byas pa/ rtsa ba la shin du gnas pa/ thams cad du rgyu zhing rlung dmar bzhin du thog pa med pa/ nam mkha'i mthar thug pa ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag byang chub
170b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po lnga mi zad pa ste/ de la dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ gang 'di dad pa'i
171a1(mdo sde): dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /de la dad pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ dad pa gang gis chos bzhi la dad pa ste/ bzhi
171a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba na spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad pa ste/ de las kyi rnams par smin pa la rten pa yin/ dge ba'am/ sdig pa'i las gang dang gang byas pa'i las de dang
171a3(mdo sde): de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dad pa ste/ spyod pa de la zhugs nas kyang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed pa
171a4(mdo sde): dang / chos thams cad la don dam pa nges pa'i don zab mo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso ba med pa/ gang zag med par rnam par dpyod pa dang / stong pa nyid
171a5(mdo sde): dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du dad pa ste/ lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag la nyal bar gyur pa thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas
171a6(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la dad pa ste/ dad pa'i phyir the tsom dang bral/ nem nur dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
171a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la dad pa'i dbang pos dad par gyur pa'i chos de dag brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par sgrub ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la dran pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/
171a8(mdo sde): chos gang dag brtson 'grus kyi dbang po yang dag par bsgrubs pa dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi gzon te/ 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang zhe na/ dran pa'i dbang pos chos
171b1(mdo sde): gang dag chud mi gzon pa'i chos de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed de/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la shes rab kyi dbang po gang zhe na/ chos gang dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
171b2(mdo sde): pos rtse gcig tu byas pa'i chos de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos rab tu rtog cing shin tu rtogs par byed de/ gang chos de dag la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par shes shing so sor rang gis shes pa 'di ni shes
171b3(mdo sde): rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na dbang po lnga 'di dag ni lhan cig 'grogs shing rjes su 'brel ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lung bstan pa'i sar yang gzhog go/ /
171b4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na phyi rol pa'i dbang po lnga mngon par shes pa rnams sems can mngal du song ba rnams ni ji srid du de'i pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po mngon par grub par ma gyur
171b5(mdo sde): pa de srid du lung mi ston to/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag pa ji srid du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang po lnga po 'di dag dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid
171b6(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po lnga mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gzhan yang byang
171b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs lnga mi zad pa ste/ de la stobs lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes
171b8(mdo sde): rab kyi stobs so/ /de la dad pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang 'di mos pa dang / dad pa dang / mi rdzi ba ste/ gal te bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis de'i drung du 'ongs nas chos la nges par sems
172a1(mdo sde): pa'i mos pa gang yang rung ba las 'bral bar byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed na yang dad pa'i stobs la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa'i stobs de las bskyod pa 'am/ bsgul ba 'am/ bslang
172a2(mdo sde): bar mi nus te/ 'di ni dad pa'i stobs shes bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus brtsam pa gang dang gang rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang dang gang dag
172a3(mdo sde): la sbyor ba de dang de dag la stobs bskyed pa sra ba 'thob ste/ stobs bskyed pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnas de las ma rgal gyi bar du de la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang
172a4(mdo sde): bskyod pa 'am/ bsgul ba 'am/ bslang bar mi nus pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs shes bya'o/ /de la dran pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ de chos dran pa'i gnas gang dang gang la sems 'jog pa de las nyon
172a5(mdo sde): mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag gis gtor bar mi nus te/ de'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa des nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms shing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad
172a6(mdo sde): kyis mi rdzi ba yin te/ 'di ni dran pa'i stobs shes bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang zhe na/ gang 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gnas shing spyod pa ste/ de sgra dang tshig gi lam thams cad
172a7(mdo sde): kyis shin du ston kyang de'i bsam gtan dang po la sgra'i tsher ma yang sgrib par mi byed do/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod par spyod kyang de'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dga' ba dang mgu
172a8(mdo sde): ba skyes pa yang de'i bsam gtan gsum pa la sgrib par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can thams cad smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir btang snyoms par yang mi 'gyur la/ de'i
172b1(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gis gnas te/ bsam gtan dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis kyang thul bar mi nus so/ /de mnyam
172b2(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi gtong la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs shes bya'o/ /de la shes rab kyi stobs gang zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la mi
172b3(mdo sde): thul bar shes pa ste/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang de'i slob dpon med par bzo'i las dang / rig da pa dang / sngags dang / stobs kyi gnas thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten na dam pa bya dka'
172b4(mdo sde): ba/ bzod par dka' ba/ thob par dka' ba/ ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang dang gang dag gis 'jig rten las zlo ba
172b5(mdo sde): de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pas rjes su rtogs to/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi ba 'di ni shes rab kyi stobs
172b6(mdo sde): shes bya ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs lnga mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan
172b7(mdo sde): lag bdun mi zad pa ste/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson
172b8(mdo sde): 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
173a1(mdo sde): btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ /de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ dran pa gang gis chos rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnams la so sor rtog pa
173a2(mdo sde): dang / chos rnams la dpyod pa dang / chos rnams sa la kun 'gro ba dang / chos rnams la bsam pa dang / chos rnams la rjes su rtog pa ste/ de dran pa des chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs
173a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa ste gang gis de ltar dran zhing rtogs pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la chos
173a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam par 'byed pa shes te/ chos gang ji lta ji lta bur rnam par dbye bar bya ba nges pa'i don kyang nges
173a5(mdo sde): pa'i don du/ drang ba'i don kyang drang ba'i don du/ kun rdzob kyi don kyang kun rdzob kyi don du/ don dam pa yang don dam par/ brda yang brdar/ rnam par nges pa yang rnam par nges par chos de dang de dag de lta
173a6(mdo sde): bur rnam par 'byed pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang dran pa 'di dang / chos rnam par
173a7(mdo sde): 'byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / shin du sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms shes pa 'di rab tu 'dzin pa dang / spro ba dang / stobs dang / rtul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / 'dun pa dang /
173a8(mdo sde): mthu dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / lam mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
173b1(mdo sde): lag gang zhe na/ chos la dga' ba dang / chos la mos pa dang / chos la mchog tu dga' ba gang gis sems ma god pa dang dad cing 'dod pa ste/ chos la dga' ba gang gis lus dang sems shin du sbyangs par
173b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang lus shin du sbyangs pa dang /
173b3(mdo sde): sems shin du sbyangs pas nyon mongs pa bsal bas sgrib pa dang bral ba dang / zhi gnas la 'jug pa'i dmigs pa la sems gzhog pa 'di ni shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /
173b4(mdo sde): de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ sems mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni ma yin no/ /
173b5(mdo sde): gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ sems mnyam par ma bzhag pas ma yin te/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba de dag bor bas kyang
173b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ gzhan du na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad tha dad du dbye ba med pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'di ni
173b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /de la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ gang 'di ni bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams kyis sems
173b8(mdo sde): yongs su mi gtugs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang mtho dman du mi gnas pa'i phyir mi sgul ba yin te/ gnod pa med pa dang / 'phrogs pa med pa dang / rjes su
174a1(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i lam dang mthun pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems
174a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mi zad pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gang zhe na/ lam
174a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /
174a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta ba las kun nas
174a5(mdo sde): langs pa ma yin/ sems can du ma yin/ srog tu ma yin/ gso bar ma yin/ skyes bur ma yin/ gang zag tu ma yin/ shed las skyes su ma yin/ shed bur ma yin/ byed pa por ma yin/ tshor ba
174a6(mdo sde): por lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/ rtag pa dang chad par lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/ 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang /
174a7(mdo sde): lung du mi ston par lta ba las kun nas langs pa yang ma yin pa nas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par lta ba'i bar las kun nas langs pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/ /
174a8(mdo sde): de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/ rtog pa gang dag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa dag kun du 'byung ba'i kun du rtog pa de dag la mi rtog pa dang / rtog pa gang dag gis
174b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnams kun du 'byung ba'i kun du rtog pa de dag la mi rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i rtag pa zhes bya'o/ /
174b2(mdo sde): de la yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ ngag gang gis bdag la yang yongs su mi gdung zhing gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang / bdag la yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed cing gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /
174b3(mdo sde): bdag la yang mi gnod cing gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste/ ngag gang gis 'phags pa'i lam la legs par 'jug pa mnyam par bzhag pa la brtson pa'i ngag de dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ni
174b4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na gang las kyang gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las de mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang las kyang dkar la rnam par
174b5(mdo sde): smin pa yang dkar ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gang las kyang dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa yang dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba'i las de dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / las gang mi gnag mi
174b6(mdo sde): dkar zhing rnam par smin pa yang med la las kyis las zad par 'gyur ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa'o/ /de las la rton pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la brtson pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i
174b7(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtong ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag
174b8(mdo sde): med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / dgang sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / cho ga bzang po'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang / kha na
175a1(mdo sde): ma tho ba med pa dang / 'phags pas gnang ba'i 'tsho ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rtsol ba gang log pa rnams kyis 'phags pas ma gnang ba/ 'dod chags
175a2(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba byed pa'i rtsol ba de mi 'dod cing / rtsol ba gang yang dag par 'phags pa'i lam dang bden pa la 'jug pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam
175a3(mdo sde): du gtod pa'i rtsol ba de'i rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ dran pa gang shin du nye bar gzhag pa dang / mi sgul ba dang / drang ba dang / gya gyu med pa dang /
175a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i skyon gyi nyes dmigs la lta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'dren pa ste/ dran pa dang / bzhungs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam mi brjed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o/ /de la yang dag
175a5(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ yang dag pa nyid du mnyam pa dang / gang chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa ste ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nges par
175a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba la 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /yang gang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nges par gyur ba
175a7(mdo sde): la 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam ste
175a8(mdo sde): de byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / mos par byed pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / shes par byed pa
175b1(mdo sde): dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dzud pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa 'di ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
175b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi lam mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yang mi zad pa yin te/ de la zhi gnas mi zad pa gang zhe na/ gang
175b3(mdo sde): sems zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / mi 'phyar ba dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / yab yab po ma yin pa dang / mi
175b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / zhi des pa dang / bsrungs pa dang / cang shes pa dang / las su rung ba dang / rtse gcig pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang / dben par dga' ba dang / lus
175b5(mdo sde): dben pa dang / sems ma bslang ba dang / dgon par mngon du phyogs pa yid la byed pa dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / chog shes pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / cho ga phun sum
175b6(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / spyod lam bsrungs pa dang / dus shes pa dang / tshod shes pa dang / dus min shes pa dang / drod shes pa dang / dgang sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis mi mtho
175b7(mdo sde): mi dma' ba dang / ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan bu smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang du len pa dang / rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba dang / bsam
175b8(mdo sde): gtan gyi yan lag yid la byed pa dang / byams pa skyed pa dang / snying rje mngon par sgrub pa dang / dga' ba la gzhog pa dang / btang snyoms sgom pa dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa
176a1(mdo sde): dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
176a2(mdo sde): med min skye mched dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa mthar kyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po 'di dag ni zhi gnas shes bya'o/ /'di ltar zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni tshad med pa ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de
176a3(mdo sde): dag la gang brtson pa 'di ni zhi gnas mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong mi zad pa gang zhe na/ gang shes rab kyi cha dang mthun pa sgom pa'i lam ste/ chos rnams la g.yo ba
176a4(mdo sde): med par shes pa dang bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par shes pa dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / khams rnams
176a5(mdo sde): la sbrul gdug pa lta bur mthong ba'i shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba'i shes pa dang / bden pa rnams la shin tu rtogs par mthong ba'i shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
176a6(mdo sde): mi 'gal bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang bral bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa mngon sum
176a7(mdo sde): du bya ba la nges par mthong ba'i shes pa dang / yang dag pa nyid la 'jug pa mthong ba'i shes pa ni lhag mthong zhes bya ste/ lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni chos rnams yang dag par mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams ji lta
176a8(mdo sde): ba bzhin du mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams de kho na nyid du mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams gzhan ma yin pa nyid du mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams
176b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rnam par dag pa dang / bden par mthong ba'o/ /chos rnams g.yo ba med pa dang / byed pa med pa
176b2(mdo sde): dang / bdag po med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dbyer med cing ro gcig pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba'o/ /lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i
176b3(mdo sde): rnam par yang mi mthong / med pa'i rnam par yang mi mthong / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa'i rnam par yang ma mthong / dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma'i rnam par yang mi mthong ba ste/ de mthong mod kyi ci
176b4(mdo sde): yang mi mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe mthong ba med pa de'i tshe mthong ste/ lhag mthong gis kyang mthong ba yang ma yin/ ma mthong ba yang ma yin par mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe de ltar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa nyid mthong ngo / /
176b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa nyid mthong bas lhag mthong la mkhas pas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong gis de ltar mthong yang mngon par 'du mi byed par yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par
176b6(mdo sde): 'du mi byed pa las kyang mi ldang ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong mi zad
176b7(mdo sde): pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa mi zad pa yin te/ de la gzungs mi zad pa gang zhe na/ gzungs shes bya ba ni gang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
176b8(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa/ dran pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dzin pa dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / mi brjed pa dang / dran pas yang dag par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o/ /yang gzungs shes
177a1(mdo sde): bya ba ni gang gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun du 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / sems can
177a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis smras pa kun du 'dzin pa dang / legs par smras pa thams cad ma lus par kun du 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bskal pa gzhan du brjes par gyur tam/
177a3(mdo sde): tshe gzhan du brjes par gyur pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzungs kyi dran pa'i shes pa de chud za bar mi 'gyur/ brjed par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig
177a4(mdo sde): mig gis lag 'thil na skyu ru ra'i bru 'dug pa bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni gzungs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na/ spobs pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'di thogs pa med pa'i
177a5(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa dang / ma rmongs pa'i spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / dga' ba'i spobs pa dang / la gor du spobs
177a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i spobs pa dang / rno ba'i spobs pa dang / mgyog pa'i spobs pa dang / de'i spobs pa de ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su sbyangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyis bslabs pa/
177a7(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyad par lung ston pa/ 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba ste/ de de ltar
177a8(mdo sde): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /gzugs su snang ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo dang tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa la spobs par snang ba yang de snyed du/ sgrar grag pa ji snyed
177b1(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo dang tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa la spobs par snang ba yang de snyed de 'di bstan to/ /'di bshad do zhes de mi rtog cing mngon par 'du byed pa med mod kyi/
177b2(mdo sde): 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang rung ste/ gal te rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te bram ze'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te rje'u rigs kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te khyim bdag gi 'khor du 'am/
177b3(mdo sde): gal te dge sbyong gi 'khor du 'am/ gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te 'thab bral gyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te dga' ldan gyi 'khor du 'am/
177b4(mdo sde): gal te 'phrul dga'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te bdud kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor du yang rung ste/ de dang der de'i lhun gyis grub pa
177b5(mdo sde): nyid du sems can thams cad kyi dad pa dang / dbang po dag la chos rnams spobs par gyur te/ de 'dod na tshe gzhan nam bskal pa gzhan gyi bar du'ang mi ldang zhing thogs pa med par chos ston to/ /de'i
177b6(mdo sde): chos bstan pa des kyang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par bya ba'i phyir nges pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag
177b7(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
177b8(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan
178a1(mdo sde): pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub
178a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa 'jug pa'o/ /de la mi rtag pa'i don gang zhe na/ med pa'i don dang / mi chags pa'i don te dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'i don ni ma yin no/ /mi rtag pa'i
178a3(mdo sde): don ni chos la bdag med pa ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir de la rnam par 'jig pa gang yang med de/ 'di ni mi rtag pa'i don to/ /de la sdug bsngal gyi don gang zhe na/ mngon par dga' ba med pa'i don ni
178a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi don to/ /dga' ba zad pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/ /smon pa med pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/ /sdug bsngal gyi sgra rab tu bstan pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/ /nam mkha' rab tu brjod
178a5(mdo sde): pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi don ces bya'o/ /de la bdag med pa'i don gang zhe na/ bdag ni shin du bdag med pa ste/ gang bdag med pa'i don de ni gsob bo/ /gsog go/ /ya ma brla'o/ /
178a6(mdo sde): stong pa'o stong pa'i don ni bdag med pa'i don te/ 'di ni bdag med pa'i don ces bya'o/ /de la zhi ba'i don gang zhe na/ zhi ba ni zhi bas zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ zhi ba nyid zhi ba'o/ /ma zhi ba'ang zhi bas zhi bar mi
178a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gang zhi ba'i don de ni mtshan ma thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste/ 'di ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ 'di ni zhi ba'i don ces bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
178a8(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi chos gyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam mi zad pa yin te/ de la gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam gang zhe na/
178b1(mdo sde): gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/ gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing / grogs med
178b2(mdo sde): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu go cha gyon te/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyi yongs su bzung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan gyi skabs med par bdag nyid byed
178b3(mdo sde): cing bdag gi mthu stobs kyis 'phags te/ des de lta bu'i go cha sra ba bgos nas sems can thams cad kyis yongs su thob par bya ba gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su thob par
178b4(mdo sde): bya'o/ /gang 'phags pa thams cad dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob par bya ba la de bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o/ /sbyin pa ni bdag gi grogs ma
178b5(mdo sde): yin gyi bdag ni sbyin pa'i grogs so/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ni bdag gi grogs ma yin gyi bdag ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
178b6(mdo sde): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi grogs so/ /bdag la ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyis rim gro mi bya'i/ bdag gis ni pha rol du phyin pa rnams la rim gro bya'o/ /bdag la ni bsdu ba'i dngos
178b7(mdo sde): po rnams kyis rim gror mi bya'i/ bdag gis ni bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams la rim gro bya'o/ /bdag la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rim gror mi bya'i/ bdag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rim
178b8(mdo sde): gror bya'o/ /gang 'di lta bu'i chos la grogs med par bdag nyid med cing gzhan gyi go skabs med par bdag gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing grogs med par rdo rje sa'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud stobs
179a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rnams btul la/ sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam la/ de yang
179a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
179a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi thabs mi zad pa ste/ de la thabs gang zhe na/ thabs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rnam par sgrub cing slong ba ste/ thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge
179a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad nye bar gzhog pa'o/ /thabs ni bsam pa nges par sems pa'o/ /thabs ni sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /thabs ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bye brag tu 'phags pa'i chos 'dod pa'o/ /
179a5(mdo sde): thabs ni sbyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /thabs ni tshul khrims kyis skye ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /thabs ni bzod pas byang chub kyi phyir lus dang
179a6(mdo sde): ngag dang sems kyi rgyan to/ /thabs ni brtson 'grus kyis 'jug pa dang / gnas pa la brtson pa'o/ /thabs ni bsam gtan gyis bsam gtan las phyir ldog par shes pa'o/ /thabs ni shes rab kyis
179a7(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas spong ba'o/ /thabs ni byams pas dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi skyabs so/ /thabs ni snying rjes 'khor ba la mi smod pa'o/ /thabs ni dga' bas dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba la mi mjed pa'o/ /
179a8(mdo sde): thabs ni btang snyoms kyis dge ba'i rtsa dang / tshogs thams cad 'phel ba'o/ /thabs ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan 'thob pa'o/ /thabs ni lha'i rna bas sangs rgyas kyi snyan 'thob pa'o/ /
179b1(mdo sde): thabs ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa 'thob pa'o/ /thabs ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas dus gsum la chags pa med par shes pa'o/ /
179b2(mdo sde): thabs ni rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'o/ /thabs ni sems can dag gi bsam pa rnams la 'jug pa'o/ /thabs ni sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa'o/ /
179b3(mdo sde): thabs ni rgal nas bdug pa'o/ /zhugs nas kyang rgal ba'o/ /thabs ni nyon mongs pa med pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/ /thabs ni khur bor nas khur khyer ba'o/ /thabs ni tshad yod pa tshad med par
179b4(mdo sde): ston pa'o/ /thabs ni tshad med pa tshad yod par ston pa'o/ /thabs ni dbang po zhan pa rnams la gsal bar byed pa'o/ /thabs ni dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa'o/ /thabs ni lam la lam ngan par 'gro ste
179b5(mdo sde): lam ngan pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu 'god pa'o/ /thabs ni nyung ngu las mang por byed do/ /mang po las tshad med par byed do/ /thabs ni bye ba'i sems can rnams
179b6(mdo sde): 'dum par byed do/ /thabs ni tha ma dang 'bring dang rab la gnas pa'o/ /thabs ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rigs las 'khor ba'i rigs par ltung ngo / /thabs ni thar pa las bcings pa tshol lo/ /thabs
179b7(mdo sde): ni shes bya zad par byed de/ shes bya zad par yang mi ltung ngo / /thabs ni spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par byed la spyod lam rnams las kyang mi nyams so/ /thabs ni sems can la lta'i tshul khrims
179b8(mdo sde): la ma yin no/ /thabs ni bsdu bas lta ba la rten gyi rtsod pas ni ma yin no/ /thabs ni sgra 'byin pa'o/ /thabs ni khams gsum pa spyod yul pa'o/ /thabs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
180a1(mdo sde): 'thob pa'i mtshan nyid spyod pa'o/ /thabs ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dang 'dres kyi 'phags pa'i skye bo dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /thabs ni mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas shing 'khor ba
180a2(mdo sde): la mngon du phyogs pa'o/ /thabs ni bdud kyi spyod yul na nyon mongs pa med par snang ba'o/ /thabs ni thams cad nas thams cad de/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mi
180a3(mdo sde): zad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi zad pa brgyad cu ste/ mi zad pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad chud cing 'dus pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad
180a4(mdo sde): pas mi zad pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa sems skyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
180a5(mdo sde): dpa' lnga khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi phreng ba dang / me tog gi gdugs
180a6(mdo sde): dang / me tog gi rna rgyan kha dog dang / ldan pa dri dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la mngon par gtor to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi nam
180a7(mdo sde): m kha' la glu blangs te 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni
180a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir mi zad pa'i rnam pas bstan to/ /sems can gang dag mi zad pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang mos pa dang / yongs
180b1(mdo sde): su 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang mi zad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa
180b2(mdo sde): ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku las phrag pa'i ras phud de byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la chos kyi dgab pa'i phyir byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so
180b3(mdo sde): legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so/ /khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su yi rang ngo / /gang khyod la ngas rjes su yi rang ba de la sangs rgyas
180b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas phrag pa'i ras de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs te/ spyi bo la bzhag nas 'di skad
180b5(mdo sde): ces bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol ba 'di lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'ji rten gyi mchod rten lags so zhes gsol to/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / rin po che'i
180b6(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan dang / rin po ches spras pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dag 'ong bar snang ste/ de dag 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa'i
180b7(mdo sde): lus la mngon par 'gebs par byed de/ rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan can de dag las blo gros mi zad pa legs so
180b8(mdo sde): legs so/ /blo gros mi zad pa khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sgo'i le'u legs par smras te/ khyod kyis legs par smras pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes sgra byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
181a1(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang / lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan can 'di dag gang nas mchis/
181a2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i sgra dag ga las byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag
181a3(mdo sde): b la na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
181a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar 'dzin pas skyes bu dam pa 'di'i yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod cing /
181a5(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dgab pa 'di dag btang ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la
181a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / ri mo shin du cher bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces gang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen
181a7(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang / chos bstan pa 'di yang mnyan pa rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa'i ming thos pa de dag kyang rnyed
181a8(mdo sde): pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ gang dag gis 'di mngon sum du sha'i mig gis mthong la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang nyan cing thos nas kyang mos pa dang / yongs su 'dri ba dang / 'dzin
181b1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa lta ci smos shes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i legs par
181b2(mdo sde): smras pa la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis tshe'i
181b3(mdo sde): tshad bskal par gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin pa byin la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la slob cing / sems can thams cad kyis
181b4(mdo sde): nyes par byas pa yang bzod la/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas te/ bsam gtan rtse gcig dang ldan la shes rab kyi bye brag la mkhas kyang chos kyi rnam
181b5(mdo sde): grangs 'di dang bral na de'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par ngas ma bshad do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam
181b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / sgom
181b7(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas pa de ni de'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
181b8(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston te/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni de'i
182a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pas/
182a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / legs par sdom pa gang yin pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
182a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod
182a4(mdo sde): pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad kyis kyang bskyod par mi nus te/ gang chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bzod pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go/ /chos kyi
182a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / sbyor ba dang / sgom pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /chos kyi
182a6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la sems nges par sems shing rnam par mi g.yeng la rtse gcig tu nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog go/ /chos kyi
182a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na mngon sum du shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par shes pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang / nan tan shes pa gang yin pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi
182a8(mdo sde): pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dka' ba chung ngus pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag bsgom
182b1(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpas mi bskyud cing drang bar spobs pa dang /
182b2(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad kyang sems rnam par mi g.yeng bar chos la gus par yid la bgyid pas chos nyan pa ste/ ltas bzhi po de dag gis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
182b3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu chos nyan du 'dir mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bdag
182b4(mdo sde): gi stobs dang bzhon par bcas pa thams cad stobs chung bar bgyis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni de nyid
182b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' de gnas na de
182b6(mdo sde): nyid sangs rgyas shes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i gzi brjid kyi tshogs dang / stobs bskyed pas bdag gi nga rgyal dang /
182b7(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang / dregs pa rnams bcom pas chos smra ba de dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar dam bca'o/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der sems bskyed pa'i bag tsam gyis kyang
182b8(mdo sde): bar chad bgyid tu mi mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung
183a1(mdo sde): shig / lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183a2(mdo sde): chen po dag ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par rnam par dbye
183a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir snying las chung ngur gyis shig / 'khor 'di na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcur rgyas par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag tshogs
183a4(mdo sde): shing 'khod do/ /de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag
183a5(mdo sde): cag gis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du ma lus par rdzogs shing rgyas par bgyi'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na yang byang chub sems
183a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las
183a7(mdo sde): 'das nas slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa de dag
183a8(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi brlabs su rig bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa
183b1(mdo sde): d ag ji ltar khyed da ltar nga'i mdun na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par langs pa de bzhin du khyod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
183b2(mdo sde): par langs pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag blo zhan
183b3(mdo sde): pas bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir don dang / tshigs dang / yi ge yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis pa lta na bcom ldan 'das dang / mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183b4(mdo sde): chen po 'di dag la bdag / bzod pa gsold to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mi zad pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrib pa med pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dang /
183b5(mdo sde): chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa rnams la 'khrul pa med do/ /'gog pa la yang 'khrul pa med do/ /gang dag chos 'di lta bu dag rtogs par khong du chud pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i
183b6(mdo sde): don rnam par nges pa thob pa yin no/ /blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i dam pa'i mchog thob cing dbang rnyed pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rnam par
183b7(mdo sde): nges pa'i dam pa'i mchog thob pa ste/ blo gros mi zad pa sa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lus kyi 'khrul pa 'am/ ngag gi 'khrul pa 'am/ sems kyi 'khrul pa gang yang med do/ /de dag thams
183b8(mdo sde): cad ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin no/ /blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dgongs so/ /
184a1(mdo sde): blo gros mi zad pa nga lta bu rnams kyis khyod 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la shin du bzod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
184a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji lta bur gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blo gros mi zad pas
184a3(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / don dang tshig dang yi dge mi zad pa bstan pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u dang / blo gros mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos
184a4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung na de las chos la dran pa'i stobs kyi mthu bskyed pa 'bum 'gyur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag la yang bstan na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas
184a5(mdo sde): nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo
184a6(mdo sde): gros mi zad pa dang / gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te
184a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'bum pa las blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// //
184a8(mdo sde): @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la kIr ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
184b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi dang / ma byon pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
184b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das yangs pa'i grong khyer na a mra srung ba'i tshal na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs
184b3(mdo sde): pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag
184b4(mdo sde): gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/ /
184b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ste/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyangs
184b6(mdo sde): pa las nges par byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyis byin kyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi grong khyer srung ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ phyogs bcur
184b7(mdo sde): sgra shin du bsgrags pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa
184b8(mdo sde): pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sgrib pa dang kun nas sdang ba
185a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
185a2(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa las nges par byung ba/ mi dmigs
185a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'khor thams
185a4(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mi non pa'i mi 'jigs pas rnam par gnon pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus shin du brgyan pa/
185a5(mdo sde): gzugs dam pa 'dzin pa/ rgyan dang bral ba/ ri rab kyi rtse mo mthong ba bzhin du snyan pa dang grags pas mngon par 'phags pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar bsra ba sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge
185a6(mdo sde): 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnyed pa/ chos rin po che'i 'od zer las bdud rtsi'i char shin du 'bebs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi skad dang / smra ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra
185a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang / mtha' med par lta ba'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun gcod pa dang /
185a8(mdo sde): seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing sgra mngon par sgrog pa/ chos chen po'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/ mtshungs pa dang mi 'tshungs pa'i chos las yang dag par 'das pa/ chos rin po che shes
185b1(mdo sde): rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i ded dpon chen po drang ba dang / zhi ba dang / phra ba dang / 'jam pa dang / blta dka' ba dang / rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la
185b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ sems can rnams kyi 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
185b3(mdo sde): kyi ye shes la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang / ngan 'gro
185b4(mdo sde): log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 'obs thams cad las rgal bas bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba ston pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho
185b5(mdo sde): ga la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rtogs pa/ ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyar ba rab tu sbyor ba/ yon tan mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas dang
185b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa mthong ba dang / thos pa 'bras bu yod pa/ gom pa 'dor ba 'bras bu yod pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
185b7(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yon tan yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas par rtogs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lta ba zhes bya dang / mnyam mi mnyam
185b8(mdo sde): lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang / bkod pa chen po dang /
186a1(mdo sde): spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu gdung dang /
186a2(mdo sde): rtag tu dga' dgod dbang po dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / smon lam la zhugs pas phyin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu sgrub pa thob dang / nam
186a3(mdo sde): mkha'i mdzod dang / rin chen sgron ma 'dzin dang / rin chen dpa' dang / rin chen dga' ba dang / rin chen dpal dang / mig 'phrul can dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / dmigs pa med pa'i bsam
186a4(mdo sde): gtan dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rin chen gtong dang / bdud 'joms dang / glog gi lha dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan brtsegs yang dag 'das dang / seng ge'i nga ro
186a5(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / ri'i rtse mo kun du 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / spos kyi ba glang glang po che dang / rtag tu 'bad dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba
186a6(mdo sde): ba dang / rab kyi blo gros dang / mdzes par skyes dang / pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / pad mo bkod pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / tshangs pa'i dra ba can dang /
186a7(mdo sde): rin chen gdan dkar can dang / bdud las rgyal dang / zhing snyoms brgyan dang / nor bu rin chen gdugs dang / gtsug na gser dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
186a8(mdo sde): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ngo / /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa nas tshangs pa ral pa can la sogs pa tshangs pa khri bcom ldan 'das
186b1(mdo sde): la lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so/ /gling chen po bzhi pa so so nas kyang brgya byin khri nyis stong lhags te/ de dag kyang
186b2(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus so/ /de bzhin du gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pas tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
186b3(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang der lhags so/
186b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /rgya mtsho'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab
186b5(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa bzhin du 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te lam me lhan ne lhang nges dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lid tsa bi gzhon nu dkon
186b6(mdo sde): mchog 'byung gnas lid tsa bi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs nas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ a mra srung ba'i tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
186b7(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ rin po che'i gdugs ji lta bu thogs pa de dag gis
186b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyabs te/ mngon par bskyabs nas phyogs gcig 'khod do/ /rin po chen 'i gdugs de dag phul ma thag tu de'i mdo la sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i
187a1(mdo sde): gdugs de dag gcig tu gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khebs par snang ngo / /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
187a2(mdo sde): kyi chu zheng de dag kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo / /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa rnams dang / gangs ri dang / ri btang bzung
187a3(mdo sde): dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldan dang / rin po che'i ri dang / ri nag po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / deg thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo / /stong gsum gyi stong chen
187a4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po gang dag yod pa rnams dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang / lu ma 'bab pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo / /stong
187a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
187a6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas dang / grong dang / gror khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen
187a7(mdo sde): po gcig po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos ston pa gang 'byung ba de yang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de las 'byung ba'i sgrar grag go/ /de nas bcom ldan
187a8(mdo sde): 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu nas yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa la
187b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod do/ /de nas lid tsa bi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
187b2(mdo sde): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gtsang zhing mdzes pa pad ma'i 'dab
187b3(mdo sde): ltar yangs pa'i spyan/ /dgongs pa dag cing zhi gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes/ /dge ba'i las bsags yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang / /dge sbyong zhi ba'i lam brten khyod la phyag 'tshal
187b4(mdo sde): lo/ /skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa'i rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig /bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing mchog rab gsal kun kyang gda'/ /khyod kyi chos kyi bka' mchid rgya che 'chi med
187b5(mdo sde): 'gro/ /de dag thams cad nam mkha' 'di yi dkyil na gda'/ /khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal srid mchog 'di chos kyis rgyal/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi nor kyang stsal/ /
187b6(mdo sde): chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa/ /chos kyi dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /mchis pa ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma lags
187b7(mdo sde): dang / /chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas 'byung ba dang / /'di la bdag med tshor ba po dang byed med cing / /dge sdig las ci'ang chud mi za zhes gsung
187b8(mdo sde): gis ston/ /thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas/ /byang chub mchog rab zhi ba mi 'chi bde ba brnyes/ /de la tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba med/ /mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis de mi
188a1(mdo sde): rtogs/ /rmad byung chos kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du/ /lan gsum bzlas pa chos kyi 'khor lo rnam mang po/ /shin du zhi ba rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor/ /de tshe dkon mchog gsum po dag kyang nye bar bstan/
188a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyis legs par gang btul ba/ /de dag rtog pa ma mchis rtag par rab tu zhi/ /khyod ni skye rga na 'chi mthar 'byin sman pa'i mchog /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang la mgos phyag 'tshal/
188a3(mdo sde): sti stang legs par bgyis pas mi bskyod ri rab bzhin/ /tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrims 'chal la mtshungs par byams/ /mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing thugs kyang nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems can dkon mchog 'di
188a4(mdo sde): la su zhig mchod mi bgyid/ /thub pa chen po 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ /khyod kyi zhal du rab tu dad pa'i yid kyis lta/ /thams cad kyis kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdun gnas mthong / /de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas
188a5(mdo sde): mtshan lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig rab tu phyung ba yang / /'khor rnams kyis ni gsung la tha dad rnam par rig /'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas
188a6(mdo sde): mtshan lags so/ /gsung gcig rab tu bsgrags pa mdzad pa de yis ni/ /kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtogs par byas/ /som nyi 'tshal ba 'dren pas rab tu zhi mdzad de/ /de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs
188a7(mdo sde): rgyas mtshan legs so/ /stobs bcu 'dren pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma 'dres pa yi chos rnams nges par rab rtogs pa/ /'gro ba
188a8(mdo sde): thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du sbyor ba'i bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin nas skam la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dub pa'i 'gro ba sgrol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
188b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'gro bar mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams dang 'gro bar zhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang / /'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs/ /pad ma dag ni chu skyes chu yis
188b2(mdo sde): yongs mi gos/ /thub pa'i pad mas stong pa nyid ni nges par bsgoms/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun du rab tu bsal/ /khyod ni ci la'ang smon par mdzad pa yong mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas dag gi mthu chen
188b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /nam mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lid tsa bi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod
188b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lid tsa bi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di dag kyang
188b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang lags shes sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhu na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
188b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lid tsa bi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs
188b7(mdo sde): so legs so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dri ba legs so/ /de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /
188b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas lid tsha bi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung
189a1(mdo sde): gnas dang / lid tsa bi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gyi zhing ni byang
189a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du sems can rnams la rgyas par byed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /sems can rnams
189a3(mdo sde): ji lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas
189a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams 'phags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na
189a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ji lta bur bya ba 'dod pa de bzhin du
189a6(mdo sde): byed mod kyi nam mkha' la ni byar mi rung zhing brgyan du yang mi rung ba de bzhin du/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin
189a7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkhar ni byar mi rung ngo / brgyan du mi rung ngo / /dkon mchog 'byung gnas
189a8(mdo sde): 'on kyang bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
189b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
189b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
189b3(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
189b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims
189b5(mdo sde): kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bsam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su srung ba'i sems can rnams skye bar
189b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing bzod pa dang / dul ba dang zhi gnas
189b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i chos thams
189b8(mdo sde): cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa dang
190a1(mdo sde): shes bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dag pa nyid
190a2(mdo sde): du nges pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / snying
190a3(mdo sde): rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams zhi byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
190a4(mdo sde): zhing der rnam par grol ba thams cad kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thabs
190a5(mdo sde): dang spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
190a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / 'ardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgrub pa shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
190a7(mdo sde): yongs su sngo ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa
190a8(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing mi khom pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la
190b1(mdo sde): gnas shing pha rol gyi ltung ba mi gleng ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ltung ba'i sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/ dge ba bcu'i las
190b2(mdo sde): kyi lam yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshe nges pa dang / longs spyod che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bde ba'i rjes su
190b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa dang / ngag 'jam pa dang / 'khor mi phyed pa dang / bye ba sdum pa la mkhas pa dang / phrag dog dang bral ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang
190b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ci 'dra bar bsam pa yang de 'dra'o/ /bsam pa ci 'dra bar sbyor ba yang de 'dra'o/ /
190b5(mdo sde): sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa yang de snyed do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed par nges par sems pa yang de snyed do/ /nges par sems pa ji snyed par sgrub pa yang de snyed do/ /sgrub pa ji snyed par yongs su
190b6(mdo sde): bsngo ba yang de snyed do/ /yongs su bsngo ba ji snyed par thabs rnams kyang de snyed do/ /thabs rnams ji snyed par zhing yongs su dag pa yang de snyed de/ zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
190b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/ /sems can yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yongs su dag pa yang de
190b8(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /bstan pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/ /ye shes bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sems yongs su dag pa yang
191a1(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 'dod pas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji lta bur
191a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ji ltar bur
191a3(mdo sde): sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de sems yongs su ma dag
191a4(mdo sde): gam/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongasu ma dag par snang snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa
191a5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam ci na dmus long dag gis mi mthong / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so/ /
191a6(mdo sde): de dmus long gis nongs kyi nyi ma dang zla bas ni ma nongs so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa mi mthong ba de
191a7(mdo sde): ni sems can rnams kyi mi shes pas nyes kyi de la de bzhin gshegs pas nyes pa ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag mod kyi khyod kyis de mi mthong ngo / /de nas tshangs pa ral pa can gyis
191a8(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig /btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi
191b1(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste dper na btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa
191b2(mdo sde): 'ang kho bos de 'dra ba mthong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'di mtho dman dang / tsher ma dang / g.yang sa dang / ri'i rtse mo dang /
191b3(mdo sde): ngam grog dang / 'jim ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo / /tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong ba ni btsun pa shA ri'i bu sems la mtho dman yod cing
191b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so/ /gang dag btsun pa shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad la sems mnyam zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni
191b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos bsnun pa dang / bsnun ma thag tu 'jig rten
191b6(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma brtsegs pa dang / rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dag rin po che brgya stong du ma so sor bkod par gyur pa 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'jig
191b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen mtha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra'o/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing bdag nyid kyang rin po che'i
191b8(mdo sde): pad ma bkod pa'i stan la 'dug pa snyam byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di mthong ngam
192a1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i bkod pa 'di dag gda'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra mod kyi sems
192a2(mdo sde): can dman pa rnams yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags par ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rnams rin po che'i snod
192a3(mdo sde): g cig tu zas za yang bsod nams ji lta bu bsags pa'i bye brag gis lha'i zas bdud rtsi nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes pa dag kyang sems can ji
192a4(mdo sde): ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa 'di snang ba na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na
192a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /lid tsa bi gzhon nu gang dag lid tsa bi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang lhan cig tu lhags pa lnga brgya po de dag kyang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /
192a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag brtul ba dang / de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de phyir sngon gyi rang bzhin du gyur par snang ngo / /de na nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi lha dang mi rnams 'di snyam du
192a7(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ma'o 'du byed 'di dag ni mi rtag go snyam du rig nas srog chags sum khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par
192a8(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po la mos pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas bla na med
192b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na lid tsa bi dri ma med par grags pa
192b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ sngon gyi rgyal la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par
192b3(mdo sde): rtsen pa/ gzungs thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ chos kyi tshul zab mo la shin du zhugs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las nges par byung ba/ thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du
192b4(mdo sde): chud pa/ spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa las nges par byung ba so so ci rigs par chos ston pa/ theg pa chen po 'di
192b5(mdo sde): la brtson par byas shing shes par byas pa/ shin du brtags te las byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam la gnas pa/ blo dam pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur te rab
192b6(mdo sde): tu bsngags pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas te/ sems can
192b7(mdo sde): mgon med pa dang dbul po rnams bsdu ba'i phyir longs spyod zad mi shes pa/ sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ sems can sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang
192b8(mdo sde): ba dang / gnod sems can dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / khro ba'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bzod pa dang dul ba thob pa/ sems can le lo can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba/
193a1(mdo sde): sems 'khrug pa'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab rnam
193a2(mdo sde): par nges pa thob pa/ gos dkar po gyon la dge sbyong gi spyod pas phun sum tshogs pa/ khyim gyi gnas na gnas la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang ma
193a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / slas rnams kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa/ g.yog bran gyis yongs su bskor bar snang yang rab tu dben par spyod pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan par snang yang rtag tu
